data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Import lessons and quizzes from other teachers  - The Online lesson library includes the ability to create new lessons and share them automatically with other teachers. This ____ teachers ____ search ____ keyword ____ related ____ or ____ standard ____ lessons ____ fit ____ particular ____ guide ____ curriculum. Once these lessons and quizzes are imported the teacher may customize them to fit their needs.

Once these lessons and quizzes are imported the teacher may customize them to fit their needs.
data.answer: 从其他教师导入课程和测验——在线课程库包含创建新课程并自动与其他教师分享的功能。这使得教师可以通过关键字搜索相关课程，或者通过标准搜索符合他们特定节奏指南或课程的课程。一旦这些课程和测验被导入，教师可以定制他们以适应他们的需要。
